channel.title: Devolution_v7
channel.description:
[img]http://img155.imageshack.us/img155/317/zamagokxu6.png[/img]
Please, note, I did not create this source nor do I take credit for it. This was created by Winter and Bakatool, so please do not think I did it. Credits - 89.5% Winten creating the base and most edits. 9.5% Bakatool for massive coding and changes. 3% MSD Productions for posting this ~ AS requested I edited the dodian v3.0 server removed all mysql base used: real dodian v3 credits: winten 90%, 10% bakatool. Look below this topic post for attachments they teach how to add npc drops/fix doors/weapons by Newb 2341 ~removed mysql ~added a few loaders for random cfg files ~deleted alot of unused code ~fixed some bugs like you die when you login ~floating head ~Added 7 working doors as a example how easy it is to add doors. (doors.cfg in bin/config folder) ~Added 15 working drops for rats/dad/durids as a example how easy it is to add drops (npcdrops.cfg in bin/config folder) ~Fixed friends list./pming ~Precompiled no need java JDK if you won't really be coding anything. Whats so special about this server???? This is one of a few servers that has complete protection against any crashers/(SYIpkpker)/dossers/flooders/spammers/massers. Also lag free! IDK what else to say ehh enjoy Reply if you are using this. *update* V6 updates ~ female face messed up glitch fixed ~ added silabs item support. v5 ~ Fixed npc bug npcs were wrong ID because of npcSlot packet problem ~ from mans, farmers, warriors, rouges, master farmers, guards, knights, watchman, paladins, gnome, heros and elfs all work. ~ Fixed pickpocketing not working on some npcs works on all now. ~ FUlly working legends guild (Shadow Warriors under + thieivng chest lvl 85 thieving++) ~ Must talk to legends guild Guard to open gates. ~ added 2 new doors to doors.cfg for legends guild. ~ Added a few more choppable tree's in seers like yew/maple/oak/and a few magic tree's 7 of em original places ~ Added working dungeon at 2677,2404 ~ Added pkable drops you lose all items if you die in pk (mage arena ONLY) ~ Fixed up pkmatch use of ::pking (you still lose all items FYI). ~ Premium Member Shop works (Armour salesman at Yanille) ~ Fixed the bank dupe \ banking in duel thanks to sasquiotch! ~ Added more dodian mobs hellhounds,fire gaints thanks to Ksu ~ Made some of the npcs walk.. ~ Added Barrows drops (Yes you have to walk a long way from varrock, to Canifis) ~ added 2 doors fence to get to canifis church. First from varrock walk to @ 3319,3468 (Fence) Near the canifis church click (trapdoor) @ 3405,3506 ~ Added a 2 doors in that dungeon to get to canifis ~ click the Holy barrier inside the dungeon to get to canifis ~ 771 serverobjs now. v4.5 Nothing big at all don't even download v4.5 if you did too much work on your v4 already ~This has my autospawn.cfg (168 KB) appended with sasquiotch's dungeon mobs (less boring) ~Also npcdrops.cfg has more of sasquiotch's item's ~Wanted to add silabs item's support but it makes people invisible with moparscape Use this to add Silabs Items: [Only Registered and Activated Users Can See Links. Click Here To Register...] ~Edited some coding forgot what I think it was Player.java ~working ::pking command v4.5 and V5 ONLY v4 ~Fixed a big problem with logging in a character with a WRONG PASSWORD!! during a reconnection v4 ~Fixed players can see their own crowns v4 ~Fixed bans/ipbans/tempbans now all work! v4 v3 ~ in V3 made friends list go to World 8 when you logout so client don't crash IDK making it say offline has a 50\50 chance of crashing your file so now it won't crash but downside you have world 8 instead of offline ~Fixed -1,-1 error where screen is black and you login please wait and nothing. v2 ~removed strict saving checks and many people had problem with java not finding bin folder so i removed it. ~Fixed friends list in v2, added more drops to drurids and chickens to show you how to add em npcdrops.cfg ~Added 4 doors (Mage Guild) requested commands there is tons of em. player commands outrock - disabled not finished command prem - says message to buy premiums button - teh button hax!!! does obviosuly nothing. female - makes u a girl yay? male - makes u a boy specbar - special bar draw testing? fix - fixes some global objects ballin - ballinnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnn max - show max hit pking - join pking match (disabled) debug - debug mode shows alot of info to you. redesign - open char screen char - open char screen equipment - shows my equipment in chat zzz - sleeping letters ZZZ bank - open bank (i think disabled) pass - password on homepage to change empty - delete all my items. help - says what to do on server players - shows all players online yell - yellllllllllll mod -yelll to all mods so they hear yah. mod commands modhelp - tells you all mod commands I THINK disabletrade enabletrade kick - kick a player xteletome - teleports a player to u (use playername) xteleto - teleports me to a player (use playername) random - playername does a random for a player (used if they autoing to fux em up) clientdrop - kicks a player clientdr0p - kicks a player tban - tempban (USE pid from ::players like 0,1,2,3,4,30,99) pban - permban (USE pid) mute - mute player never added it but its 50% added. (adds mutes to list) does really mute while player is online. ipban - ipban (USE pid) banname - ban use players name unban - unbans player never added so disabled unmute - same as above disabled tempban - old command use tban banuser - old command use pban tele - teleport to x,y (added by me) pnpc - make me into a npc morphing update - update timer use numbers shuts down server kickall - kicks all players admin commands pickup - spawn items? (added by me) setnpc -used to set a npc number later used by another command called addnpc tryemotes - show emotes addnpc - spawns a npc on top of you (this doesn't work for dumping it should) odump - dumps all the new gathered objects to objects.cfg in config folder oadd - turns on dump mode to add all new objects to objects.cfg used before odump command smsg - reset all npcs (kills all npcs) used when npcs were lured too far away head - change my head switch - change from anicants to regular magic stillgfx - spawn graphic on top of u using numbers animation - make you do animation like dance by number. pets - gives you pet menu bomb - boooooooooooom everyone takes damage hit - use player name it makes em get caught in a whirlpool (stuck lol) goobject - make global object on top of you goup - go up a ladder ( but just goes up in map) godown - goes down a ladder (just goes down in map too) skullz - gives you a skull (testing command i guess) duel - opens duel screen (testing command) xteletome - a admin command to teleport a player to me ( 2 same commands 1 for admin/mod) xteleto - another duplicate command just for admins emote - do emote use numbers make - make a object on on X,Y,ID you pick remove - remove a object on X,Y,ID you pick wolf - make you a wolf npc test - testing some kind of animation test1 - make you some unkown npc 2589?? unpc - turn of player npc map - map on screen of boat trip (test command) map2 - map on screen of boat trip2 (test command) sythe- little buttons on screen (test command) blackhole - a black hole (test command) mbox - mbox on screen (test command) view1 - dig screen (test command) snow - make it snow nosnow- make it not snow mypos - tells you information you need to know for a few of the commands bank - bank command that works for admins Custom commands Bakatool added dropparty - makes a drop party in front of yenllie randomitems - gives everyone online a free item randomly.
Devolution_v7: [url=http://www.myuploads.googlepages.com/Devolution_v7.rar]DOWNLOAD[/url]

item.title: Devolution_v7

item.title: Devolution_v7
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Asamin, post:7, topic:268901”]I have a slight problem with the starting of the server. When I go to start it I get:

Devolution Server 7.0 - Created by Winten/Bakatool
-------------------------------------------------------
Loading npcs... npc.cfg: file not found.
drops... npcdrops.cfg: file not found.
spawn list...autospawn.cfg: file not found.
done!
item.cfg: file not found.
globaldrops.cfg: file not found.
doors.cfg: file not found.
shops.cfg: file not found.
objects.cfg: file not found.

and even when I change the path I get something like this instead:

Devolution Server 7.0 - Created by Winten/Bakatool
-------------------------------------------------------
Loading npcs... config\npc.cfg: file not found.
drops... config\npcdrops.cfg: file not found.
spawn list...config\autospawn.cfg: file not found.
done!
config\item.cfg: file not found.
config\globaldrops.cfg: file not found.
config\doors.cfg: file not found.
config\shops.cfg: file not found.
config\objects.cfg: file not found.

What is it that needs to be changed?[/quote]
You need to move those configuration files into the same folder as your batch file.

Read full topic

item.title: Devolution_v7
item.dc:creator: @Olzax Olzax
item.description:
@Olzax wrote:

Please, note, I did not create this source nor do I take credit for it. This was created by Winter and Bakatool, so please do not think I did it.

Credits -

89.5% Winten creating the base and most edits.
9.5% Bakatool for massive coding and changes.
3% MSD Productions for posting this

~

AS requested

I edited the dodian v3.0 server removed all mysql

base used: real dodian v3
credits: winten 90%, 10% bakatool.

Look below this topic post for attachments they teach how to add npc drops/fix doors/weapons by Newb 2341

~removed mysql
~added a few loaders for random cfg files
~deleted alot of unused code
~fixed some bugs like you die when you login
~floating head
~Added 7 working doors as a example how easy it is to add doors. (doors.cfg in bin/config folder)
~Added 15 working drops for rats/dad/durids as a example how easy it is to add drops (npcdrops.cfg in bin/config folder)
~Fixed friends list./pming
~Precompiled no need java JDK if you won’t really be coding anything.

Whats so special about this server???
This is one of a few servers that has complete protection against any crashers/(SYIpkpker)/dossers/flooders/spammers/massers.
Also lag free!

IDK what else to say ehh enjoy

Reply if you are using this.

update
V6 updates

~ female face messed up glitch fixed
~ added silabs item support.

v5
~ Fixed npc bug npcs were wrong ID because of npcSlot packet problem
~ from mans, farmers, warriors, rouges, master farmers, guards, knights, watchman, paladins, gnome, heros and elfs all work.
~ Fixed pickpocketing not working on some npcs works on all now.
~ FUlly working legends guild (Shadow Warriors under + thieivng chest lvl 85 thieving++)
~ Must talk to legends guild Guard to open gates.
~ added 2 new doors to doors.cfg for legends guild.
~ Added a few more choppable tree’s in seers like yew/maple/oak/and a few magic tree’s 7 of em original places
~ Added working dungeon at 2677,2404
~ Added pkable drops you lose all items if you die in pk (mage arena ONLY)
~ Fixed up pkmatch use of ::pking (you still lose all items FYI).
~ Premium Member Shop works (Armour salesman at Yanille)
~ Fixed the bank dupe \ banking in duel thanks to sasquiotch!
~ Added more dodian mobs hellhounds,fire gaints thanks to Ksu
~ Made some of the npcs walk…
~ Added Barrows drops (Yes you have to walk a long way from varrock, to Canifis)
~ added 2 doors fence to get to canifis church.
First from varrock walk to @ 3319,3468 (Fence)
Near the canifis church click (trapdoor) @ 3405,3506
~ Added a 2 doors in that dungeon to get to canifis
~ click the Holy barrier inside the dungeon to get to canifis
~ 771 serverobjs now.

v4.5
Nothing big at all don’t even download v4.5 if you did too much work on your v4 already
~This has my autospawn.cfg (168 KB) appended with sasquiotch’s dungeon mobs (less boring)
~Also npcdrops.cfg has more of sasquiotch’s item’s
~Wanted to add silabs item’s support but it makes people invisible with moparscape
Use this to add Silabs Items: [Only Registered and Activated Users Can See Links. Click Here To Register…]
~Edited some coding forgot what I think it was Player.java
~working ::pking command v4.5 and V5 ONLY

v4
~Fixed a big problem with logging in a character with a WRONG PASSWORD!! during a reconnection v4
~Fixed players can see their own crowns v4
~Fixed bans/ipbans/tempbans now all work! v4
v3
~ in V3 made friends list go to World 8 when you logout so client don’t crash IDK making it say offline has a 50\50 chance of crashing your file so now it won’t crash but downside you have world 8 instead of offline
~Fixed -1,-1 error where screen is black and you login please wait and nothing.
v2
~removed strict saving checks and many people had problem with java not finding bin folder so i removed it.
~Fixed friends list in v2, added more drops to drurids and chickens to show you how to add em npcdrops.cfg
~Added 4 doors (Mage Guild) requested

commands there is tons of em.
player commands
outrock - disabled not finished command
prem - says message to buy premiums
button - teh button hax!!! does obviosuly nothing.
female - makes u a girl yay?
male - makes u a boy
specbar - special bar draw testing?
fix - fixes some global objects
ballin - ballinnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnn
max - show max hit
pking - join pking match (disabled)
debug - debug mode shows alot of info to you.
redesign - open char screen
char - open char screen
equipment - shows my equipment in chat
zzz - sleeping letters ZZZ
bank - open bank (i think disabled)
pass - password on homepage to change
empty - delete all my items.
help - says what to do on server
players - shows all players online
yell - yellllllllllll
mod -yelll to all mods so they hear yah.

mod commands
modhelp - tells you all mod commands I THINK
disabletrade
enabletrade
kick - kick a player
xteletome - teleports a player to u (use playername)
xteleto - teleports me to a player (use playername)
random - playername does a random for a player (used if they autoing to fux em up)
clientdrop - kicks a player
clientdr0p - kicks a player
tban - tempban (USE pid from ::players like 0,1,2,3,4,30,99)
pban - permban (USE pid)
mute - mute player never added it but its 50% added. (adds mutes to list) does really mute while player is online.
ipban - ipban (USE pid)
banname - ban use players name
unban - unbans player never added so disabled
unmute - same as above disabled
tempban - old command use tban
banuser - old command use pban
tele - teleport to x,y (added by me)
pnpc - make me into a npc morphing
update - update timer use numbers shuts down server
kickall - kicks all players

admin commands
pickup - spawn items? (added by me)
setnpc -used to set a npc number later used by another command called addnpc
tryemotes - show emotes
addnpc - spawns a npc on top of you (this doesn’t work for dumping it should)
odump - dumps all the new gathered objects to objects.cfg in config folder
oadd - turns on dump mode to add all new objects to objects.cfg used before odump command
smsg - reset all npcs (kills all npcs) used when npcs were lured too far away
head - change my head
switch - change from anicants to regular magic
stillgfx - spawn graphic on top of u using numbers
animation - make you do animation like dance by number.
pets - gives you pet menu
bomb - boooooooooooom everyone takes damage
hit - use player name it makes em get caught in a whirlpool (stuck lol)
goobject - make global object on top of you
goup - go up a ladder ( but just goes up in map)
godown - goes down a ladder (just goes down in map too)
skullz - gives you a skull (testing command i guess)
duel - opens duel screen (testing command)
xteletome - a admin command to teleport a player to me ( 2 same commands 1 for admin/mod)
xteleto - another duplicate command just for admins
emote - do emote use numbers
make - make a object on on X,Y,ID you pick
remove - remove a object on X,Y,ID you pick
wolf - make you a wolf npc
test - testing some kind of animation
test1 - make you some unkown npc 2589??
unpc - turn of player npc
map - map on screen of boat trip (test command)
map2 - map on screen of boat trip2 (test command)
sythe- little buttons on screen (test command)
blackhole - a black hole (test command)
mbox - mbox on screen (test command)
view1 - dig screen (test command)
snow - make it snow
nosnow- make it not snow
mypos - tells you information you need to know for a few of the commands
bank - bank command that works for admins

Custom commands Bakatool added

dropparty - makes a drop party in front of yenllie
randomitems - gives everyone online a free item randomly.

Devolution_v7: DOWNLOAD

Read full topic
